scripts.postinstall: find node_modules/expo/node_modules/@expo -name '*.js' ! -name '*.bak*' -exec sed -i.bak 's|metro/src/|metro/private/|g;s|metro-cache/src/|metro-cache/private/|g;s|metro-transform-worker/src/|metro-transform-worker/private/|g' {} \; && sed -i.bak 's|const metro_cache_key_1 = __importDefault(require("metro-cache-key"));|const metro_cache_key_1 = require("metro-cache-key");|;s|(0, metro_cache_key_1.default)(|(0, metro_cache_key_1.getCacheKey)(|g' node_modules/expo/node_modules/@expo/metro-config/build/transform-worker/metro-transform-worker.js && find node_modules/expo/node_modules/@expo/metro-config/build/serializer -name 'serializeChunks.js' -o -name 'withExpoSerializers.js' | while read file; do node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let c=fs.readFileSync('$file','utf8'); c=c.replace(/const (\w+) = __importDefault\(require\(\"metro\/private\/DeltaBundler\/Serializers\/sourceMapString\"\)\);/g, 'const \$1 = require(\"metro/private/DeltaBundler/Serializers/sourceMapString\");'); c=c.replace(/const sourceMapString = typeof (\w+)\.(?:default|sourceMapString) !== .function.\s+\? \1\.(?:default\.)?sourceMapString(?:\.sourceMapString)?\s+: \1\.(?:default|sourceMapString);/g, 'const sourceMapString = \$1.sourceMapString;'); fs.writeFileSync('$file', c);"; done
